TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ContentPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ContentPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示某种类型的哪个属性是 XAML 内容属性。

span.span: Indicates which property of a type is the XAML content property.

summary.span: 处理特性化类型的 XAML 表示形式的 XAML 子元素时，XAML 处理器会使用此信息。

span.span: A XAML processor uses this information when processing XAML child elements of XAML representations of the attributed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关联的属性的类型不是`string`或`object`，XAML 处理器会尝试确定的值转换技术。If the associated property of a is not of type `string` or `object`, a XAML processor attempts to identify a value conversion technique. 对于本机类型转换，XAML 语言基元的或特定的本机转换，通过该特定的 XAML 编写器实现的是第一项检查。The first check is for native type conversion, either of the XAML language primitives or of specific native conversions enabled by that particular XAML writer implementation. 下一步所查找的类型转换器。The next step is to look for a type converter. 在.NET 实现中，基于标识的类型转换器任一在成员级别或类型级别定义适用。In the .NET implementations, a type converter is identified based on on either the member level or type level definition that applies. 如果可以不标识任何值的转换，则 XAML 对象编写器通常会引发异常。If no value conversion can be identified, a XAML object writer typically throws an exception. 为了接受多个单个对象元素作为内容，XAML 内容属性的类型必须为集合类型受支持。In order to accept more than a single object element as content, the type of the XAML content property must be supportable as a collection type. 由于`Inherited=true`属性的值声明通常适用于所有派生类的内容属性标记。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 应用空使派生的类由基类中删除内容的属性特性的声明 （并请注意此类具有任何内容属性）。Applying an empty enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and to note that the class has no content property). 应用以不同方式命名替换继承替换为新。Applying a differently named replaces the inherited with the new one. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类存在于特定于 WPF 程序集中 WindowsBase，并还具有的并行实现中 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF)。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase, and also had a parallel implementation in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 从.NET Framework 4.0、位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.0, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 类在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 使用的一个示例是，后者类继承。An example of a class in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) that uses the is , which the class inherits from. 属性是由设置内容属性。The property is the content property set by the . 如果在 XAML 中，实例化的将设置为开始和结束按钮标记之间的元素。If a is instantiated in XAML, the of the will be set to the element that is between the start and end button tags. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为类`Film`具有应用。The following example creates a class named `Film` that has a applied. 名为的属性`Title`指示作为内容的属性。The property named `Title` is indicated as the content property. [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupcontentpropertyattribute)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupContentPropertyAttribute](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupcontentpropertyattribute)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于`Inherited=true`属性的值声明通常适用于所有派生类的内容属性标记。Because of the `Inherited=true` declaration of the attribute, a value for a normally applies a content property designation to all derived classes as well. 使用此签名，或应用空，允许派生的类，以删除内容的属性特性的声明由一个基类 （并记下此类具有任何内容属性）。Using this signature, or applying an empty , enables a derived class to remove a declaration of a content property attribute by a base class (and note that the class has no content property).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 作为内容属性的属性的名称。

span.span: The property name for the property that is the content property.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定具有 CLR 支持，提供`name`应匹配CLR 中的相关属性的类型系统。Assuming CLR backing, the provided `name` should match the of the relevant property in the CLR type system.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取作为内容属性的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that is the content property.

value.span: 作为内容属性的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property that is the content property.
